HomePage.title: Unlock Your Language Learning Potential Today
HomePage.subtitle: Memory Assistant is your ultimate tool for mastering foreign words effortlessly. With our innovative features, you can translate, create personalized dictionaries, and test your knowledge to enhance your learning experience.

features.title: Easy to translate text and new words saving a lot of time

addWords.title: Add unknown words to your personalized dictionaries for effective learning
addWords.subtitle: Our intuitive interface makes language learning simple and engaging

takeTests.title: Take tests to reinforce your understanding and retention of vocabulary
takeTests.subtitle: Challenge yourself with various tests tailored to your learning pace

sentenceExamples.title: Examine sentence examples to gain a deeper understanding of words in context and usage
sentenceExamples.subtitle: Contextual learning enhances your ability to remember and apply new words
